```{r, warning=FALSE}
##Load Required Libraries
library(tm) # Framework for text mining.
library(SnowballC) # Provides wordStem() for stemming.
library(RColorBrewer) # Generate palette of colours for plots.
library(ggplot2) # Plot word frequencies.
library(magrittr)
library(wordcloud)
##library(Rgraphviz)

```


```{r, warning=FALSE}
##Set variables used 
min_freq=75
max_freq=1000000
max_words=100
assoc_word = "lord"
correlation = .25

##Load the text file
txt.in <- readLines("C:/Users/bryan_000/Documents/GitHub/Data/morman13.txt")
```

```{r}
##Convert to corpus
txt <-VectorSource(txt.in)
txt.corpus <-Corpus(txt)
rm(txt.in)
rm(txt)
```

```{r}
##Clean up the text
##Conversion to lower case by:
txt.corpus<- tm_map(txt.corpus, content_transformer(tolower))

##Remove Numbers
txt.corpus<- tm_map(txt.corpus, removeNumbers)

##Remove Punctuation
txt.corpus<- tm_map(txt.corpus, removePunctuation)

##Removal of stopwords by:
txt.corpus<- tm_map(txt.corpus, removeWords, stopwords("english"))

##Stem the Document
txt.corpus<- tm_map(txt.corpus, stemDocument)

##Stem the Document
txt.corpus<- tm_map(txt.corpus, stripWhitespace)

##Inspect the corpus
##inspect(txt.corpus)
```


```{r}
##Ready to Analyze the data
tdm <-TermDocumentMatrix(txt.corpus)
##inspect(tdm)
```

```{r}
##Establish Frequence  can set Low freq and high freq
findFreqTerms(x=tdm, lowfreq=min_freq, highfreq=max_freq)
```


```{r}
# Make a word cloud
m <- as.matrix(tdm)
v <- sort(rowSums(m),decreasing=TRUE)
d <- data.frame(word = names(v),freq=v)

##Define colors
pal2 <- brewer.pal(8,"Dark2")

##png("wordcloud.png", width=1280,height=800)
wordcloud(d$word,d$freq, scale=c(8,.3),min.freq=45, max.words=max_words, random.order=T, rot.per=.15, colors=pal2, vfont=c("sans serif","plain"))
##dev.off()
```

```{r}
##Find assocaitions with a selected word
findAssocs(tdm, assoc_word, correlation)
```
